data.description:
# Join our Discord to apply for the closed BETA ! 
**bit.ly/discordJustHoops**

Retro Inspired. Future Forward. Derived from the **arcade classic Pop-A-Shot**, **JUST HOOPS** brings retro arcade-basketball to new school mixed reality. Featuring over 60 levels of changing hoops, numerous challenges, and multiple play modes, JUST HOOPS can turn any slow moment into an exciting time with friends and family.

Introducing our brand-new **Trick Shot game mode in closed Beta!** Customize your trick shots **at home in mixed reality** and share them with other players online, adding a creative twist to your game.

Whatever your skill level, you can find your form. Thereâ€™s a range of gameplay for anyone to master - from casual to hardcore. Choose between using **controllers** or your **bare hands** as your hoop targets change at every increasing level, from the traditional Pop-A-Shot to animated hoops like snakes, space invaders, dinosaurs, rotating hoops with closing lids, and more!
 
Play in **mixed reality** or one of our multiple VR environments as you compete online or in solo mode. Your space, your arena. 
 
# **Pull Up. Wherever you are!**

changelog.change_log:
JUST HOOPS - fix
===============
- Fix upgrade of saves from old version to new version

---
version 1.6.731#edd3ea682

JUST HOOPS - BIG UPDATE
=======================

- New packs: Dinosaurs & Pop-A-Shot
- New environments
- New musics
- Improved solo Series
- Improved online Series
- Improved menu
- Improved haptic feedbacks
- Improved First Time Experience
- More Ready Player Me Avatars too choose

---
version 1.6.727#d3b182d7b

JUST HOOPS - BIG UPDATE
=======================

- Improve online challenges
- Rename challenges to Series
- Improve display of coins per level
- Online multiplayer 1vs1
- Online private room up to 4 players
- Cross play PICO 3/4 vs QUEST 2/PRO
- Background matchmaking while playing solo
- Fast menu & shiny multiplayer room
- Ready Player Me Avatars
- fix: point to Playfab production servers
- fix: haptic feedbacks back
- fix: online challenges selection
- fix: background matchmaking cooldown

---

- fix: online challenges selection
- fix: background matchmaking cooldown

JUST HOOPS - BIG UPDATE
=======================

- Online private room up to 4 players

*Online multiplayer is not available on Quest1*

version 1.4.343#2aac1a6a6

=== 1.3.65, 0d89319 ===

Even easier to shoot hoops
Chinese, Japan, Korean languages

=== Version 1.3.49, e61a3ab ===
* New name : JUST HOOPS
* New content: "Haunted House" with 14 new levels, 7 challenges, new balls, sound effects, musics, ...
* Improved controls with a grab button for easier, one-handed and basketball style shooting
* Use the directions and buttons on the controllers to interact with the menu
* Passthrough mode to play in the real world
* Record yourself in mixed reality with MRC to share on social networks
* Colorblind mode
* Autorepeat feature on menu buttons
* Bug fixes

=== Version 1.3.48, 07e2773 ===
* New name : JUST HOOPS
* New content: "Haunted House" with 14 new levels, 7 challenges, new balls, sound effects, musics, ...

* Use the directions and buttons on the controllers to interact with the menu

3686afb - v1.1
- Improved & steady frame rate on Quest1: 72hz & Quest2: 90hz
- Improved CRT rendering on the coin-op
- German localization 
- Quit the game from the main menu on the coin-op
2d4b538 - Fix walkthrough (level #14)

7374c8e - CRT: deactivate debug about FOV of camera
+ custom tweaks on scene to regain 90hz on Quest2 (not pushed) : removed dynamic shadows on Diner/room meshes & arcade

4981f4e - Project version
First soum!
